mapper.select:
select * from (
SELECT u.id, u.`code`, u.`name`, u.salt, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ap.`airport_id`) AS 'ariPortsIds', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ap.`airport_name`) AS 'ariPortsNames', u.phone, count(ao.order_id) AS tmonth, u.state, u.job, lmonth, (lamonth + count(ao.order_id)) AS total FROM `sys_users` u LEFT JOIN `sys_user_airport` ua ON ua.`sys_id` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN `sys_airport` ap ON ap.`airport_id` = ua.`airport_id` LEFT JOIN app_orders ao ON ao.id = u.id AND DATE_FORMAT(ao.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{today} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(a.order_num) AS lamonth, a.airport_id FROM app_order_archive a ) aoa ON aoa.airport_id = ua.airport_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(a.order_num) AS lmonth, a.airport_id FROM app_order_archive a WHERE a.`year` =#{year} AND a.`month` = #{month} ) aoa1 ON aoa1.airport_id = ua.airport_id WHERE u.user_type = 3
and u.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
GROUP BY u.`name` ORDER BY create_time DESC) A
order by ${sort} ${order}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_users ( `name`, `phone`, `state`, `entry_time`, `password`, `sex`, `user_type`, `login_name`, `create_time`, `update_time`, `salt`, `dtflag`, job, code, extra_passwd ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{phone}, #{state}, #{entryTime}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{userType}, #{loginName}, #{createdatetime}, #{updatedatetime}, #{salt}, #{dtflag}, #{job}, #{code}, #{extraPasswd} )
mapper.delete: update sys_users set dtflag =1 where id=#{id} and user_type=3;
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_users u SET u.extra_passwd= #{pwd},u.password=#{password} where u.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct(city.cid),u.id FROM sys_users u INNER JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON sua.sys_id = u.id INNER JOIN sys_airport sa ON sa.airport_id = sua.airport_id INNER JOIN sys_city city ON city.CID = sa.province where u.id=#{uNo}
